description:
The Sage Canyon Shelter is the companion you need for sun-soaked escapades. It’s spacious enough to accommodate a folding table, yet compact so you can toss it into your car, onto a raft, or stuff it into your backpack like you're playing shelter Tetris – the choice is yours!

  • Made from durable polyester taffeta with a polyurethane water-resistant coating
  • Mesh-lined, 3D roof vents offer plenty of ventilation
  • Pre-bent pole design for easy setup and durability
  • Webbing frame creates more stability by adding tension to all four corners
  • Pre-cut guy lines and tensioners come attached to the shelter for fast setups
  • Includes 8 Dirt Dagger™ UL stakes
  • Add on up to four Accessory Walls (sold separately) for even more protection and privacy
  • Interior loops for hanging Accessory Walls, MtnGlo® lights, or gear lofts (sold separately)
name: Big Agnes Sage Canyon Shelter
